body: Thinking out loud, here's a possibly terrible, half-baked idea. Introduce a Cheaper Op. (Choose? Any?) It takes a variable number of arguments, all of which must contain equivalent values. Rewrite x%y to Cheaper(x%y, x-y*(x/y)). During arch-specific optimizations, as appropriate, rewrite Cheaper(Select(...), ...) to the Select and afterwards (lower in file), rewrite Cheaper(v, w) to w.
